mapper.select: select s.sponsorNo,cd.accountHolder,LEFT(s.juminNo,6) jumin,code.codeName,cd.accountNo,cd.amountPerMonth,code.etc1 from [commitmentDetail] cd LEFT JOIN [EB13_commitmentDetail] eb ON eb.state='성공' AND cd.ID=eb.commitmentDetailID LEFT JOIN [commitment] c ON cd.commitmentID=c.ID AND (c.endDate is null OR c.endDate>GETDATE()) JOIN [sponsor] s ON c.sponsorID=s.ID JOIN [code] ON cd.bankID=code.ID WHERE cd.paymentDay=#{pDay}
select * from EB21_commitmentDetail where EB21ID in (select ID from EB21 where EB21.paymentDate=#{paymentDay})
mapper.update: update EB21_commitmentDetail set state='에러' where commitmentDetailID IN (select cd.ID from EB21_commitmentDetail eb JOIN commitmentDetail cd ON eb.commitmentDetailID=cd.ID JOIN commitment c ON cd.commitmentID=c.ID JOIN sponsor s ON c.sponsorID=s.ID JOIN EB21 e ON e.paymentDate='2016-09-25' where s.sponsorNo=#{sponsorNo})

update EB21_commitmentDetail set state='성공' where commitmentDetailID NOT IN (select cd.ID from EB21_commitmentDetail eb JOIN commitmentDetail cd ON eb.commitmentDetailID=cd.ID JOIN commitment c ON cd.commitmentID=c.ID JOIN sponsor s ON c.sponsorID=s.ID where s.sponsorNo=#{sponsorNo}) AND EB21ID IN (select e.ID from EB21 e where e.paymentDate='2016-09-25')
mapper.select: select e.createDate,s.sponsorNo,s.name,c.commitmentNo,eb.state,d.name donationPurpose from EB21_commitmentDetail eb JOIN commitmentDetail cd ON eb.commitmentDetailID=cd.ID JOIN EB21 e ON eb.EB21ID=e.ID INNER JOIN code ON cd.bankID=code.ID LEFT JOIN commitment c ON cd.commitmentID=c.ID LEFT JOIN sponsor s ON c.sponsorID=s.ID JOIN donationPurpose d ON c.donationPurposeID=d.ID
